name: SIEChain

attributes.documentation:
@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation:
@title Ownable
The Ownable contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation:
The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
attributes.name: Ownable

attributes.documentation: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
attributes.name: onlyOwner

attributes.documentation: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
attributes.name: transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@title Pausable
Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.
attributes.name: Pausable

attributes.documentation: Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.
attributes.name: whenNotPaused

attributes.documentation: Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
attributes.name: whenPaused

attributes.documentation: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
attributes.name: pause

attributes.documentation: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
attributes.name: unpause

attributes.documentation: @title ERC20 interface
attributes.name: ERC20
StandardToken

attributes.documentation: check if given address is frozen. Freeze works only if moderator role is active
attributes.name: isFrozen

attributes.documentation: Freezes address (no transfer can be made from or to this address).
attributes.name: freeze

attributes.documentation: Unfreezes frozen address.
attributes.name: unfreeze
balanceOf
transfer
transferFrom
approve
allowance

attributes.documentation: Pausable token with moderator role and freeze address implementation*
attributes.name: ModToken

attributes.documentation: check if given address is frozen. Freeze works only if moderator role is active
attributes.name: isFrozen

attributes.documentation: Freezes address (no transfer can be made from or to this address).
attributes.name: freeze

attributes.documentation: Unfreezes frozen address.
attributes.name: unfreeze

attributes.documentation: Declines transfers from/to frozen addresses.
attributes.name: transfer

attributes.documentation: Declines transfers from/to/by frozen addresses.
attributes.name: transferFrom
